# makeRasterizationRateMap(descriptor:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a rasterization rate map instance.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeRasterizationRateMap(descriptor: MTLRasterizationRateMapDescriptor) -> (any MTLRasterizationRateMap)?
```

## Parameters

- **descriptor**: An [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRasterizationRateMapDescriptor] instance.

## Return Value

A new [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRasterizationRateMapDescriptor] instance if the method completes successfully; otherwise `nil`.

## Creating rasterization rate maps

- **supportsRasterizationRateMap(layerCount:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the GPU can create a rasterization rate map with a specific number of layers.
